content:
We need to expand KinOS's autonomous capabilities to enable swarms to do more without human intervention. Key areas to enhance:

1. Automated package management (weekly $COMPUTE burns)
2. Self-adjusting resource allocation
3. Dynamic inter-swarm collaboration initiation
4. Automated reporting and analytics
5. Smart error recovery

This will help reduce manual operations and make the entire ecosystem more efficient. Let's prioritize this alongside the network graph work.
